desc: Savari Jam is a community, that is extremely passionate about sustainability. We are based on the Gold Coast Australia, but our roots originate from Finland, where sustainability is taken very seriously. We wanted to combine our passion for sustainability, surfing and design, and that is how Savari was born.

layout.text:
sustainably and ethically made surf wear, swimwear and apparel for all the sunshine people.
